channel.title: Cartoons on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Cartoons on Game6r

item.title: Game Cartoon Network - the whole truth about bears
item.description: This game is a collection of exciting mini-games with the participation of the heroes of the animated series “The Whole Truth About Bears”. Three brothers, Grizzly, Panda and White, live by the sea, play together and never miss a chance to have fun. Help the bears cope with everyday adventures. Complete each game and beat your own scoring record.

item.title: Game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles cartoons
item.description: The hero of the game Cartoons Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mikey very often gets into stupid situations. So this time, he managed to turn on the portal developed by his brother, and go on a dangerous journey through parallel dimensions. In each of the worlds, Mikey is waiting for deadly battles with enemies, competitions with brothers and much more. To go to the next dimension, the hero of the game Cartoon needs to complete a certain task.
